subdisciplines.name: Animation
subdisciplines.description: The creation of moving images using computers, graphics, and other media technologies.

subdisciplines.name: Game Design
subdisciplines.description: The design and development of video games using computer programs and creative design.

subdisciplines.name: Graphic Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography, and illustration.

subdisciplines.name: Interactive Media
subdisciplines.description: The creation of digital experiences that allow user interaction with media content.

subdisciplines.name: Web Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of designing and creating websites, including layout, usability, and visual aesthetics.
